job_name: Construction Manager/ Site Agent/ Works Manager
company_name: Ming Hing Waterworks Engineering Co Ltd
job_details:
Job Highlights
Lead project teams to complete the projects 
15-20 years solid experience in civil engineering
Familiar with NEC Project Requirements
Job Description
Duties & Responsibilities:




Ensure all projects meet clients and statutory requirement; 
Lead project teams to complete the projects on schedule, within budget and at a high level of quality; 

Participate in the preparation of tender documents and technical submissions;

Responsible for contract administration; 
Ensure all company policies and plans are aligned to the broader group processes and systems;

Perform other ad hoc duties as assigned. 


Requirements:




Degree in Civil Engineering or related disciplines; 
MHKIE or equivalent in Civil discipline with NEC experience for Construction Manager and Site Agent;

For Construction Manager, Applicant should have at least 20 years post professional qualification experience in civil engineering construction management and planning, contract administration, site coordination and control, among which at least 10 years
 management experience with main contractor and 1 year proven experience as construction manager or site agent in use of NEC or accredited NEC project manager.

For Site Agent, Applicant should have at least 15 years post professional qualification, among which 5 years in management position and 10 years in water or wastewater works of which 2 years in laying large diameter steel water mains (DN 600 or larger)
 and 5 years in temporary traffic management and 1 year proven experience as construction manager or site agent in use of NEC or accredited NEC project manager.

For Works Manager, , Applicant should have at least 15 years post degree experience, among which 10 years in mains laying works, of which 2 years in laying large diameter steel water mains (DN600 or larger)

Good command of spoken and written English and Cantonese; 
Immediately available is highly preferred. 


Benefit:

We offer good career prospects,6-day work (Alt. Sat), training sponsorship allowance, medical allowance and intensive discretionary bonus to the right candidates. 




Working Hour   : Mon – Sat (Alt Sat)    08:00 – 18:00 
Work Location  : Site Office 
Holiday              : Public Holiday 
Annual Leave   : 14 -16 days 
Paid Leave        :Birthday Leave/ Marriage Leave/ Maternity Leave/ Paternity Leave/ Compassionate Leave



Job Application:




Please click "Apply Now" to submit your application.　 
Application without expected salary will not be considered. 


Personal Information Collection Statement:




Personal data provided to Ming Hing Waterworks group is solely for recruitment purposes. Your personal data may be transferred within the group for recruitment use only.

Ming Hing Waterworks group may disclose relevant data that applicants provided to the person(s) and organization(s) as stated for this recruitment purposes.

To update your personal data or to request for a copy after submission of job application form, please contact Human Resources Department at (852) 2380 8265 or e-mail by clicking "Apply Now".

透過「就業．進修 相輔相承」的完善學徒訓練計劃，學徒可在有系統、有規管及有支援的情況下累積工作經驗及繼續學業； 
獲公司資助，免費修讀文憑／高級文憑課程，並可於工作時間內上課； 
課程內容包括土木工程的理論、結構材料基本認識、建造工地測量及測量儀器之運用、建造工藝技術基本認識、基本合約文件、工程監督、建造工程相關法例及工程圖則等； 
工作範圍包括協助監督、管理、協調土木工程， 如道路、水務、渠務、斜坡、屋宇建造、地基或屋宇裝備等工程施工； 
公司及學徒事務主任提供全面就業輔導、支援和進度評核； 
完成整個學徒訓練可獲頒具廣泛認受的學徒畢業證書及擁有相關學歷和專業資格/牌照； 
參加 「Earn and Learn 職學計劃」，首3年培訓期內可每月獲平均$2,000政府津貼； 
成功申請勞工處「展翅青見計劃」可報讀職外職業技能培訓課程，獲津貼總額上限$4,000； 
學徒事務署每年舉辦傑出學徒獎勵計劃，嘉許表現優異的註冊學徒。獲獎學徒有機會獲安排前往外地交流、考察和培訓； 


Job Requirement




中七／中學文憑程度優先考慮； 
好學勤奮，刻苦耐勞，具良好溝通技巧；及 
有志投身建築行業，毋須工作經驗 





Please send your application with full resume and expected salary to 
Human Resources Department, Units 601-605A, 6/F, Tower B, Manulife Financial Centre, 228 Wai Yip Street, Kwun Tong, Kowloon, Hong Kong

or

Job Highlights
5-day work
double pay
Minimum of 5 years of procurement experience
Job Description

 



If cake makes you happy and you are passionate about sharing this joy to people around you, why don’t you join us and be part of LIFETASTIC’s vibrant family?










As a young and energetic company that is renowned for health-conscious layer cakes and hospitable services, we are keen to provide the best dinning experience to our customers, as well as to discover new possibilities and become a trademark of Hong Kong’s
 approach to baking and dining. We own and manage 3 shops and a fast-growing online store with rapid business expansion to open 10 new locations before 2022.


As a caring employer, LIFETASTIC is highly involved in nurturing and providing opportunities to everyone who are eager to learn and share similar vision and passion.










Job Summary



We are seeking an experienced Purchasing Officer to handle our company’s procurement activities. The Purchasing Officer’s responsibilities include conducting research on potential vendors and suppliers, inspecting goods, updating records, maintaining positive
 relationships with suppliers and coordinating with internal team regarding their supply needs.



To be successful as a Purchasing Officer you should be able to multitask and evaluate products and vendors. Exceptional Purchasing Officers should be smooth negotiators with a keen eye for detail. 


Responsibilities




Responsible for full set procurement activities from sourcing to stock management on food & non-food categories. 

Conducting product research and sourcing new suppliers and vendors.  
Sourcing materials, goods, products, and services and negotiating the best or most cost-effective contracts and deals. 

Performing inventory inspections and reordering supplies and stock as necessary. 

Inspecting stock and reporting any faulty items or inconsistencies immediately. 

Maintaining the supplier database, updating and maintaining records of all orders, payments, and received stock. 

Working closely with production team and frontline on stock ordering and keep the purchasing database. 

Liaise with internal and external parties for production schedule and quality checking. 

Attending product launches and networking with industry professionals. 
Working to improve purchasing systems and processes. 
Perform administration duties and ad hoc duties. 




Requirements




Bachelor’s degree in purchasing, supply chain management or any other related disciplines

Minimum of 5 years of procurement experience, preferably obtained from the food manufacturing/ catering/ food-related industry. 

Excellent command of both spoken and written Chinese and English; Proficiency in Mandarin would be desirable.

Strong excel skills, possess good quantitative & qualitative analysis background.

Knowledge on inventory system, ERP. 
Proficient in communication and negotiation skills. 
A must-have passion for cakes, food and making new connections! 


We offer 5-day work, double pay and attractive remuneration package to the successful candidate. Interested parties can email your detailed resume and expected salary to us.    


All information received will be kept in strict confidence and only for employment purposes.

Our client company is a leading contractor originating in Hong Kong with over 50 years of experience. They have established a reputation of a reliable building contractor for quality and complex projects across the public and private sectors. As their company is expanding, they are now inviting a 
Safety Supervisor 
to join their team and help to improve their services.
 
About the Role
 
 As a Safety Supervisor, you can expect your major responsibilities to be the followings:
Ensure all works are carried out effectively and in a safe manner
Monitor the safety or protection for on-site construction activities
Identify hazards on construction sites in avoiding potential accidents
Conduct investigation to workplace accident/incident
Ensure compliance with the safety and environmental laws and regulations and client's specifications.
Develop internal safety communication strategy ensuring appropriate policies, procedures are in place
Conduct SIC (Safety Induction Course) for contractors, staff, and clients.
Develop an auditing and certification strategy to verify and validate the effectiveness of the safety programs.

Diploma / Degree in Occupational Health & Safety or equivalent
Solid Experience in conducting site inspections
Good Knowledge of risk management strategies and processes
Open to relocation on a global level
Good communication, interpersonal and project management skills
Fluency in spoken and written English and Chinese

job_name: Regulatory Compliance Manager - Chinese Commercial Bank
job_details:
Job Highlights
General Compliance
Regulatory Compliance
Chinese Bank
Job Description
Compliance Manager role to cover all sort of regulatory compliance matters for this well-known Chinese bank
 
 
Your new company
 Your new company is an expanding Chinese commercial bank. They have newly created this headcount at Manager level (min. 4 years in-house compliance) to join their General Compliance team within Legal & Compliance department to ensure that risks are properly identified and assessed, and performing extensive compliance review/ self-assessment for their commercial banking business.
 
 
Your new role
 As an influential member within the general compliance team, you will carry out the compliance monitoring programme on high-risk operations ad responsible for performing compliance review and conduct gap analysis on internal compliance manual and procedures. Below are the mainly objectives of your role:
 
Develop, review and enforce compliance programmes in accordance with the policies and guidelines of the bank and regulatory bodies.
Conduct regular compliance reviews to ensure following of procedures are meeting regulatory requirements/ business changes
Work closely with other business units and provide sufficient internal training on all regulatory compliance issues to enhance the compliance consciousness of all staff levels.
 
What you'll need to succeed
Ideally you will have at least 4 years of experience experience in compliance/ internal control functions within a bank.
Prior experience working in Chinese/Regional financial institutions will be highly preferable.
Possess good knowledge of local regulatory (HKMA, SFC) requirements.
Good command of both spoken and written English and Chinese, Mandarin proficiency is an advantage
Candidates with less working experience will be considered for an Assistant Manager position
What you'll get in return
Competitive compensation package alongside consistent career development
Opportunities to work with experienced compliance specialists within the field
Involvement in regional compliance projects
Lead and transform the strategy and future of a well-established team

Selection Criteria & Application
 Procedures




In addition to academic qualifications, The Group seeks candidates with exceptional personal qualities. To be considered
 for Management Trainee Program (2018), candidates should have the following:




Educational Qualifications




University graduates (in any disciplines), preferably with major in Business Administration, Marketing, Finance, Accounting, Economics or relevant
 discipline
 
Proven English and Cantonese or Mandarin proficiency






Personal Qualities





Strong leadership potential


A passion in finance, management and marketing


A creative mind, flexible thinking, resilient attitude and an ability to think laterally


Good communication, interpersonal and analytical skills


Self-motivated and pro-active
